summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4067 for the improvement of the alley in block 58, D.T. Denny's Park Addition, being the alley between 4th Avenue North and 5th Avenue North, from Denny Way to John Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49038, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
